A4.text: Plaza Mayor, Madrid, a plaza in the centre of Madrid, Spain

A5.text: The main Spanish national art museum, located in central Madrid

A7.text: With over 135,000 m2 (1,450,000 sq ft) and 3,418 rooms, the Royal Palace of Madrid is the largest royal palace in Europe and one of the largest in the world.

A8.text: The palace is on the site of a bygone Muslim-era fortress constructed by Emir Muhammad I of Córdoba in the 9th century.

A9.text: Gran Vía, Madrid, street in Madrid

A10.text: Gran Vía (Madrid Metro), metro station in Madrid
